name: MeshtasticsLoRaAPI
description:
Please note, this currently only works on Unix systems
Integration for Meshtastic's LoRa, utilising the provided HTTP API.
You need to have the Meshtastic Python CLI installed for this to work.
For it to work, you need to specify a chatURL file once on the Host.
To do this run: 'meshtastic --set-url https://meshtastic.com/o/thegivenurl' on the sender as well as the reciever.
